/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. On the left side of the street, a car is parked, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene setting. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
